channel.title: Saudi Arabia on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Saudi Arabia on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Korea’s CJ ENM Launches Saudi Arabia Subsidiary in Major Middle East Expansion
item.description: The Korean entertainment powerhouse says the subsidiary will facilitate Middle East collaborations across music, television, film, and live entertainment, including large-scale K-pop concerts.
